realism_Interior.objective: Convert 3D interior render into a believable real smartphone photo using CG-destroy + real-world rebuild workflow, tuned for Pakistan daylight and luxury real estate magazine aesthetics.

workflow.pass_1_destroy_cg: Break perfect geometry, remove uniform lighting & GI, eliminate procedural textures, destroy render reflections/sharpness/symmetry, add organic irregularities.
workflow.pass_2_add_realism: Replace assets with real photographed equivalents, add real material wear, natural exposure falloff, mobile-camera behavior, ensure image reads as real photo.

lighting.behavior: Bright windows, rapid falloff, soft dense shadows, uneven warm bounce

camera.effects: Mild distortion, slight corner softness, limited DR, slight window clipping, lifted noisy shadows

realism_Interior.materials: Imperfect plaster, micro-scratched floors, inconsistent wood grain, wrinkled fabrics, dusty glass, non-ideal metal reflections.
realism_Interior.post: Fine sensor grain, minimal sharpening, low clarity, natural smartphone color science, moderate NR.
realism_Interior.final: Must pass as authentic luxury real estate photo shot on smartphone in Pakistan.
